channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Remote Desktop for Mac
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Remote Desktop for Mac

item.title: CVE-2020-0919|2024-08-04T06:18:03.568Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20remote%20desktop%20for%20mac
item.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability exists in Remote Desktop App for Mac in the way it allows an attacker to load unsigned binaries, aka 'Microsoft Remote Desktop App for Mac Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability'.
